cause.description:
It is our hope to bring about a change in the Republican party in the sense that they have strayed from the conservative views that they have so long been based upon.
1. Abortion is murder.
2. The right to bear arms is a right guranteed by the United States Constitution.
3. Taxes stifle the economy.
cause.mission: Bring the Republican party back to the conservative values that made it what it is.
cause.name: Save the Elephants
